Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local lastAttack = 0
local r = game:service("RunService")
local damage = 15
while Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") == nil do wait() end
local storeWeld = Tool.FireWeld
while Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") == nil do wait() end
local firePart = Sword.FirePart
while firePart:FindFirstChild("Fire") == nil do wait() end
local fire = firePart.Fire
local daggerSound
local cooldown
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.LungeSlash) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil --swordOut() if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) --swordUp() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) if humanoid.Health - damage < 2 and fire.Enabled then local cloneScript = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("SpiritScript") if cloneScript == nil then fire.Enabled = false cooldown = Tool:FindFirstChild("Cooldown") if cooldown.Value == 0 then cooldown.Value = 1 end cloneScript = Tool.SpiritScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent if cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Torso") then print("MyTorso", myTorso) cloneScript.Torso.Value = myTorso cloneScript.Disabled = false end end else humanoid:TakeDamage(28) end end end end end
function swordUp() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.75, 0, 0, -1, -1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) end
function attack() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastAttack < 0.2) then daggerSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("SwordSound") if daggerSound then daggerSound:Play() end lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else --attack() stabAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) if stabAnim then stabAnim:Play(0, 1, 2) end end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() if storeWeld then storeWeld.Parent = Sword end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 17.0 end end
function onUnequipped() -- do nothing if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end if daggerSound then daggerSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Dagger = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter
local cooldown = Tool:FindFirstChild("Cooldown") while cooldown == nil do wait() cooldown = Tool:FindFirstChild("Cooldown") end
function cd() cooldown = Tool:FindFirstChild("Cooldown") local firePart = Dagger:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local fire if firePart then fire = firePart:FindFirstChild("Fire") end if cooldown and cooldown.Value == 1 then wait(25.0) cooldown.Value = 0 if fire then fire.Enabled = true end end end
cooldown.Changed:connect(cd)
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local ch = vCharacter:GetChildren()
local bodyVelocity
local firePart = Instance.new("Part") firePart.FormFactor = 3 firePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) firePart.Transparency = 1.0 firePart.Name = "FirePart" firePart.CanCollide = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = firePart fire.Color = Color3.new(178/255, 178/255, 178/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 6
local targetTorso = script:FindFirstChild("Torso") while targetTorso == nil do targetTorso = script:FindFirstChild("Torso") wait() end
local storeHealth = 0 local storeCFrame
for i = 1, #ch do if ch[i].className == "Tool" then ch[i]:Remove() end end
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 end
if myTorso then bodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bodyVelocity.P = 300000 bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P, bodyVelocity.P) bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) bodyVelocity.Parent = myTorso
firePart.Parent = game.Workspace
local fireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") fireWeld.Name = "FireWeld" fireWeld.Part0 = myTorso fireWeld.Part1 = firePart fireWeld.Parent = myTorso end
wait(2) if myHumanoid then storeHealth = myHumanoid.Health storeCFrame = myTorso.CFrame myHumanoid.Health = 0 end if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity:Remove() end
wait(1.0)
function follow(targetTorso) while targetTorso and firePart do local distance = (targetTorso.Position - firePart.Position).magnitude if distance > 2 then if firePart then firePart.Velocity = (targetTorso.Position - firePart.Position).unit * 30.0 end end wait() end end
if targetTorso and targetTorso.Value then targetTorso = targetTorso.Value
if fireWeld then fireWeld:Remove() end
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, firePart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) bodyForce.Parent = firePart
firePart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) firePart.CFrame = storeCFrame
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() follow(targetTorso) end))
debris:AddItem(firePart, 6)
firePart.Touched:connect(function(hit) if firePart and hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and hit.Parent.Torso == targetTorso then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and firePart then if firePart then firePart:Remove() firePart = nil end if (humanoid.Health + (storeHealth * 2.25) + 3)< humanoid.MaxHealth then humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + (storeHealth * 2.25) + 3 else humanoid.Health = humanoid.MaxHealth end end end end) else if firePart then firePart:Remove() end if fireWeld then fireWeld:Remove() end end
wait(6.0) script:Remove()

local Tool = script.Parent local Lantern = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer
local sg local frame
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("LanternGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "LanternGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 260, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -130, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
local genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 127/255, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Unleash the power of the heart!"
end end end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
